name: 3 Jewels
description:
The new Match-3 Jewels puzzle game with addictive gameplay. Swap jewels to match 3 or more and create waves of excitement in this fun and delicious puzzle game. Crush 100 Jewelled Challenge Levels & become the 3 Jewels Leaderboard Champion or simply enjoy the Endless stress free Matching Level.

How to Play:

- Match 3 identical jewels to eliminate them
- Match more jewels for multiple points


Features:

-Endless Mode
-100 Challenge Levels
-Jewel Bombs
-Move Hints
-Slide to Move
-No In App Purchases
-Minimal Permissions
